title: Charlotte's Chance
description: Charlotte  I had no idea that when I accepted to lead the latest space exploration mission, I would end up in some strange galaxy, about to be sold as a slave. Then he saved me. A muscled warrior, a commander in a race of beautiful aliens. He entranced and captivated me.  Ryker  I had no idea that by attacking a slave ship, I would meet the most exotic creature I had ever seen. There was no species like it in the federation.  I am a war dog, built for battle, not love. I am not good enough for a creature like her but I can only resist for so long. If she doesnâ€™t return to her planet soon my control will snap. Then nothing will stop me from making her mine, not even the ones who want to steal her back from me.
author: Kadie C.
